get.description: List the operations for the provider
List blueprint assignments within a subscription or a management group.

put.description: Create or update a blueprint assignment.

parameters.name: deleteBehavior
parameters.description: When deleteBehavior=all, the resources that were created by the blueprint assignment will be deleted.

get.description: List operations for given blueprint assignment within a subscription or a management group.

parameters.name: assignmentOperationName
parameters.description: Name of the blueprint assignment operation.

put.description: Create or update a blueprint definition.

parameters.name: artifact
parameters.description: Blueprint artifact to create or update.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: Version of the published blueprint definition.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: Version of the published blueprint definition.

parameters.name: publishedBlueprint
parameters.description: Published Blueprint to create or update.

AssignmentDeploymentJob.description: Represents individual job in given blueprint assignment operation.

action.description: Name of the action performed in this job.

history.description: Result of this deployment job for each retry.

requestUri.description: Reference to deployment job resource id.

AssignmentDeploymentJobResult.description: Result of each individual deployment in a blueprint assignment.

error.description: Contains error details if deployment job failed.

resources.description: Resources created as result of the deployment job.

AssignmentJobCreatedResource.description: Azure resource created from deployment job.

AssignmentListResult.description: The response of a Assignment list operation.

value.description: The Assignment items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

AssignmentLockSettings.description: Defines how resources deployed by a blueprint assignment are locked.

excludedPrincipals.description: List of AAD principals excluded from blueprint locks. Up to 5 principals are permitted.

excludedActions.description: Listofmanagementoperationsthatareexcludedfromblueprintlocks.Upto200actionsarepermitted. If the lock mode is set to 'AllResourcesReadOnly', then the following actions are automatically appended to 'excludedActions': '/read', 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets/join/action' and 'Microsoft.Authorization/locks/delete'. If the lock mode is set to 'AllResourcesDoNotDelete', then the following actions are automatically appended to 'excludedActions': 'Microsoft.Authorization/locks/delete'. Duplicate actions will get removed.

timeFinished.description: Finish time of the overall underlying deployments.

deployments.description: List of jobs in this blueprint assignment operation.

resourceGroups.description: Names and locations of resource group placeholders.

status.description: Status of blueprint assignment. This field is readonly.

locks.description: Defines how resources deployed by a blueprint assignment are locked.
